flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Have a older or broken laptop that is no longer as mobile? Would you prefer if it was more like it's desktop all-in-one brethren?
guide.introduction_rendered: Have a older or broken laptop that is no longer as mobile? Would you prefer if it was more like it's desktop all-in-one brethren?

lines.text: Acquire a Laptop, preferable broken or be older. I had an old HP Compaq nc6230. It works great but it's battery life of 45 minutes and screen resolution of 1024x768 isn't the greatest. I did however have a 1600x900 panel sitting around with the same basic hardware.
lines.text_raw: Acquire a Laptop, preferable broken or be older. I had an old HP Compaq nc6230. It works great but it's battery life of 45 minutes and screen resolution of 1024x768 isn't the greatest. I did however have a 1600x900 panel sitting around with the same basic hardware.

guide.summary:
Taking an old laptop placing a large screen on it and putting it in an all-in-one format.

This project will need to be modified to accommodate various system and needs. You will need to have some woodworking, soldering, and general smarts to pull this
guide.title: Turn an old Laptop into a Desktop
